adaptive_res.name: Adaptive Resolution
adaptive_res.description: Match canvas resolution to canvas size, and canvas size to window.

canvas_size.name: Canvas Size
canvas_size.description: Size of the canvas on the screen. Ignored if adaptive resolution is enabled.

canvas_resolution.name: Canvas Resolution
canvas_resolution.description: The internal size of the canvas. Ignored if adaptive resolution is enabled.

fullscreen.name: Fullscreen
fullscreen.description: Toggles fullscreen. Only works when using Electron; in browser, hit F11 instead.
